Source.Name: kwooty
Source.Summary: Kwooty is a NZB usenet binary downloader for KDE
Source.Description: Kwooty is a NZB usenet binary downloader for KDE. Features : automatic file verification - repairing with par2 files, automatic archive extraction (Rar, Zip and 7z archive formats supported), built-in YEnc and UUEncode file decoders, ...
